articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Newly-Built Pyongyang Bag Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Newly-Built Pyongyang Bag Factory
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission  and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the newly-built Pyongyang Bag Factory.
					The Pyongyang Bag Factory which was built in Thongil Street of Pyongyang City is a huge modern bag producer with a total floor space of more than 10,590 square meters. It is capable of producing over 242,000 school bags and 60,000 ordinary bags a year.
					
					 Noting that it is the intention of the WPK to provide the children and people with locally made good-quality and attractive bags, he personally initiated the building of the factory, guided its layout and solved problems arising in its construction one by one.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un went round the sample room, cutting shop, sewing shop, packing shop, sci-tech knowledge dissemination room, combined control room, technical preparation room, designing room and various other parts of the factory to learn in detail about its construction and production.
					
					 Seeing varieties of school bags for boys and girls of primary schools, junior and senior middle schools and universities on display in the sample room, he was pleased that the factory has produced nice bags of different shapes and colors meeting the tastes of children and students with locally available cloth and subsidiary materials.
					
					 Noting that the factory has all necessary modern equipment made with indigenous efforts and technology including laser cutter at every production process including cutting, sewing, printing, dyeing and finishing, he stressed it is a great success that more than 95 percent of the machines operating at the factory are home-made. 
					
					 The factory has a very important duty to perform, he said, setting forth such tasks facing the factory as making trademark peculiar, channeling great efforts  into improving the quality of its products to make them popular, improving their designing to increase the variety of bags, make its products diverse and multi-color, deepening researches into realizing the standardization of bags suited to the physical features of users at different  ages, effectively operating the sci-tech knowledge dissemination room and taking good care of equipment.
					
					 Recalling that it was his intention to make sure a modern bag factory was successfully built in every province and Pyongyang City took the lead in implementing the Party's policy, he highly praised the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK for correctly identifying the problems to which it attaches importance and dynamically arousing the masses to the drive for implementing its idea and policies. 
					
					 Very high is the enthusiasm of the officials and employees of the factory who have launched their campaign in the new year, he noted. 
					
					 He had a photo session with them, expressing belief that they would creditably perform their duties by devoting themselves to the bag production in the spirit of making bags for their children.
					
					 Accompanying him were An Jong Su, department director of the C.C., WPK, and Jo Yong Won and Rim Jun Gil vice department directors of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Pyongyang Mass Rally Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Mass Rally Held
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang city mass rally took place at Kim Il Sung Square Thursday to vow to carry through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, and other senior party and state officials.
					
					 Kim Su Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), and chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, in his report stressed that Kim Jong Un's New Year address is precious guidelines and an ever-victorious banner as it encourages all the army and people to give fuller play to their mental power and revolutionary zeal and thus glorify the year 2017 with most significant events in the history of the nation and heroic feats.
					
					 Last year was a year of auspicious events and great turn, worthy to be noted in the history of the WPK and the country, the reporter said, adding that the Supreme Leader's deep trust and warm loving care served as a source of greater victory.
					
					 He called upon all officials and Party members and all other working people to turn out in an all-out general offensive to attain the goals of the 5-year strategy for national economic development, under the militant slogan "Let us accelerate the victorious advance of socialism with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force!"
					
					 He stressed that all the people should regard Kim Jong Un's New Year address as a motto of life and struggle and work hard to glorify this year with great victory and hit the high goals for building a powerful socialist country set forth at the 7th WPK Congress as early as possible.
					
					 Speeches of pledge were made on behalf of the working class, agricultural workers, youths and intellectuals.
					
					 The speakers renewed the resolve to translate the people's ideals and dreams into brilliant reality by devotedly carrying through the highly important tasks set forth in the New Year address.
					
					 Then a mass demonstration was held.

articles.title: Educational Officials Determine to Make Successes in Education
articles.content:
Educational Officials Determine to Accelerate Building of Civilized Power
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said in his historic New Year Address that all the fronts in the sector of culture including education, public health, sports, literature and the arts should effect a new, revolutionary upsurge to accelerate the building of a civilized power.
					 Greatly encouraged by his New Year Address, officials in the education sector are turning out as one in the new year's march.
					
					 Kim Song Il, department director of the Ministry of General Education of the Education Commission, told KCNA:
					
					 We will launch a dynamic drive this year, a year of scientific education, to improve the facilities and environment for this education with bold and scientific operations, effective command and personal examples of our officials.
					
					 As the universal 12-year compulsory education is being comprehensively enforced and new kinds of schools emerge, we will put educational facilities and apparatuses for experiment and practice and sports apparatus on a modern basis and turn all classrooms into multi-functional ones in the general secondary education sector.
					
					 And we will concentrate our efforts on putting all the courses of teaching and experiment and practice on an IT basis, thus providing a solid foundation to meet the requirements of a socialist civilized power.
					
					 Ri Hyon Gwang, vice-president of Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 All the officials and teaching staff of the university are full of determination to make more scientific education achievements this year.
					
					 We will conduct a dynamic drive to improve the educational contents, methods and system and teaching management suited to the character of the most prestigious university in the world.
					
					 And we will make necessary educational equipment and scientific research equipment and put them on a modern basis by our own efforts on the great strength of self-reliance and self-development, thus turning the university into an educational center and the highest seat of science and education.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Deterrence for Self-Defence Is Just: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Deterrence for Self-Defence Is Just: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Countries have become earnest recently in their moves to bolster a strategic nuclear force to cope with the U.S. nuclear threats.
					 On Dec. 22 last year, Russian President Putin called for increasing military potentials of strategic nuclear force and securing missile attack capabilities enough to reliably cope with any missile defence system at present and in the future so as to contain the U.S. nuclear threat to Russia.
					
					 The Chinese Huan Qui Shibao in a commentary on Dec. 23 noted that China has already become the first strategic rival of the U.S. and that most of its pressure has transferred to China step by step, adding that the table can be turned only when China's power of strategic nuclear threat becomes enough to overwhelm the U.S. It stressed that if the U.S. aircraft carrier becomes a stage for attacking China, that has to be made to certainly face the fate of sinking.
					
					 This proves that those countries regard the bolstering of strategic nuclear force as an issue vital to protecting their independent development and peace from the U.S. increased nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 Today the global instability and the danger of nuclear war increase day by day due to the U.S. reckless nuclear arms buildup and modernization moves. To cope with this, nuclear weapons states are increasing their own strategic nuclear force in quality and quantity.
					
					 Typically, the U.S. is furthering the role of the components of its nuclear force in its NATO military strategy. About 200 U.S. nuclear bombs are already deployed in Turkey, Belgium, Germany, the Netherlands and Italy and 310 carriers are on standby.
					
					 Russia is updating triad strategic nuclear weapons system, an expression of its intent to maintain its position as a power and an exercise of its strategic power to contain NATO.
					
					 According to 2016 Moscow review of Russia's armed forces, launching devices that have already been put on an alert amount to 99 percent in missile units of Russia and over 96 percent of them are on constant standby for launch at a moment's notice.
					
					 A total of 41 new-type ballistic missiles have been put into commission, making the percentage of the modern weaponry of nuclear triad reach 60.
					
					 Russia claims in 2017 three units equipped with modern weapons will additionally be deployed in Russia's nuclear missile units and the air force will be provided with five modern strategic bombers.
					
					 China is putting spurs to developing update strategic nuclear missiles including Dongfeng-41, reaffirming its stand never to make a concession in such issues as building nuclear threat.
					
					 Such countries boasting of vast territory, big population and immense economic potentials have made it a top priority for state development and security to bolster their own nuclear forces.
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK, a country that has constantly been exposed to direct nuclear threat from the U.S., to bolster a nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The nuclear threat to the DPRK by the U.S. is so immense incomparable with that exposed to big power around it.
					
					 For more than half a century the U.S. has continued nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK, putting the biggest political and military pressure, applying the harshest sanctions and resorting to desperate moves to stifle it.
					
					 To cope with this, the DPRK carried out its first H-bomb test and conducted test-fire of various attack means and succeeded in explosion test of nuclear warhead. The preparations for the test-fire of inter-continental ballistic missile have reached the final phase. These signal achievements in the field of strategic nuclear force clearly prove that the DPRK has now possessed of powerful strategic nuclear attack means capable of responding to any form of war to be imposed by the U.S.
					
					 It is quite just for the DPRK to have had access and bolstered nuclear deterrence for self-defence in the face of the U.S. reckless hostile moves and open nuclear threat.
					
					 Building strategic nuclear force to ensure one's own security and maintaining balance of force will remain core interests of countries in the future, too.

articles.title: Removal of Military Standoff and Danger of War between North and South of Korea Urged
articles.content:
Removal of Military Standoff and Danger of War between North and South of Korea Urged
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Positive measure should be taken to avoid acute military conflict and remove the danger of war between the north and the south in order to save the Koreans from the crisis of a war, improve the inter-Korean relations and make a new breakthrough in national reunification, Rodong Sinmun Thursday stresses in an article.
					 The article says:
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to safeguard the security of the compatriots and peace of the country without fighting with the fellow countrymen. The DPRK will as ever make positive efforts to preserve peace on the Korean peninsula and security of the nation.
					
					 Today the peninsula has turned into the biggest hotbed in the world, the hotbed of a nuclear war, owing to the U.S. aggression strategy to dominate Asia and its reckless war provocation moves.
					
					 It is entirely thanks to the DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrent that a nuclear war has not yet broken out on the peninsula though the U.S. has escalated its nuclear blackmail and threat to the DPRK.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the south Korean puppet authorities are getting frantic in the provocation of war against the north in collusion with the U.S., their master, while getting vocal about the "nuclear threat from the north".
					
					 Arms buildup and war games posing a threat to the rival is the main factor rendering the situation on the peninsula extremely tense and laying a serious obstacle in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The discontinuation of arms buildup and war games against the compatriots in south Korea would remove the source of military conflict and danger of war and open an important breakthrough to improving the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: THAAD Deployment Denounced by S. Korean Women
articles.content:
THAAD Deployment Denounced by S. Korean Women
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Members of the women's organizations in different parts of south Korea, including Kimchon and Songju, reportedly gathered in Seoul on January 2 to hold a press conference rejecting THAAD deployment by the puppet defense ministry.
					 Speakers at the press conference recalled that the women have staged candlelight struggle since the ministry's announcement of its decision on THAAD deployment.
					
					 They said that THAAD is war hardware and a factor disturbing peace, adding that it will bring benefits only to the U.S. and Japan, regardless of the security of south Korea.
					
					 They warned that if the Lotte side offers a site for THAAD deployment, they would launch a campaign for boycotting Lotte goods.

articles.title: Magazine of Int'l Kothongryon Gives Special Write-ups
articles.content:
Magazine of Int'l Kothongryon Gives Special Write-ups
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Thongil, a monthly magazine of the International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon), gave special write-ups to the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The magazine carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il. It also printed photos of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il working together for the people's happiness, photos of Kim Jong Il giving energetic field guidance to factories and the countryside and art works depicting the great leaders.
					
					 Under "Major course of activities of the great General Kim Jong Il", "Kim Jong Il-Juche Idea" and other titles, the magazine introduced the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who had performed distinguished feats in bolstering up the national defence capabilities, developing the country's politics, economy and culture and realizing global independence through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities and with his prominent leadership ability.
					
					 It gave an account of national memorial service held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Italy
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Italian Organization for Friendship and Support to the DPRK brought out in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" on December 27 last year to commemorate the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il and the 25th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 5th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decade-long history of the WPK is a history of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also stresses that the cause of the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be invincible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" on its website on December 28 last year to mark the 5th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: DPRK's December Holidays Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's December Holidays Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Celebration meetings took place in Germany, Serbia, Poland, Mexico and Angola between December 20 and 27 last year to mark the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 5th anniversary of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership.
					 Speakers including the chairman of the Communist Party of Germany said that Kim Jong Il developed the KPA into an ever-victorious army and invincible revolutionary ranks with his distinguished Songun revolutionary leadership, adding that under his guidance the KPA could reliably defend the socialist gains from every obstruction of the enemies.
					
					 They also stressed that the KPA, with Kim Jong Un as its supreme commander, could always glorify the tradition of invincibility and the DPRK is a beacon of hope for the world progressives.
					
					 The honorary chairperson of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army and the chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised the exploits Kim Jong Il performed in firmly defending the sovereignty and the dignity of the country by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Un has carried forward the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il to bolster up the self-defensive nuclear deterrent of the country in every way and led the army and people of the DPRK to work fresh miracles and innovation in building a socialist power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre la Fabrica de Maletines de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre la Fabrica de Maletines de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la recien construida Fabrica de Maletines de Pyongyang.
					Esta moderna base, levantada en la capitalina avenida Thong-il, tiene un area arquitectonica de mas de 10 mil 590 metros cuadrados y produce anualmente mas de 242 mil mochilas escolares y mas de 60 mil maletines.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente tomo la iniciativa de construirla diciendo que el Partido tiene el proposito de suministrar a los ninos y habitantes los maletines bonitos de buena calidad hechos en nuestro pais.
					
					Examino personalmente el proyecto de formacion de la planta y resolvio los problemas surgidos en la construccion de ella.
					
					En su recorrido por la sala de muestras, los talleres de corte, costura a maquina y embalaje, la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, la de control general, la de preparacion tecnica, la de creacion de disenos y otros lugares, se informo en detalles del estado de construccion y produccion.
					
					Son buenos y tienen varias formas y colores los maletines escolares para los alumnos de ambos sexos de la escuela primaria, la secundaria basica y la secundaria superior y los universitarios, exhibidos en la sala de muestras, dijo y continuo que la fabrica los ha hecho con telas y accesorios de fabricacion nacional conforme al gusto y sentimiento estetico de nuestros ninos y alumnos.
					
					En todos los procesos de produccion como corte, costura a maquina, impresion, estampacion y acabado, estan instalados modernos equipos fabricados con fuerzas y tecnologias nacionales, inclusive la cortadora de laser, alabo.
					
					Es un gran exito que esta fabrica haya sido construida asegurando en mas de 95% la proporcion de equipos de fabricacion nacional, apunto.
					
					Calificando de muy importante la mision de esta fabrica, presento las tareas que le incumben, tales como disenar de modo peculiar las marcas comerciales, hacer famosas sus mercancias prestando gran atencion al mejoramiento de calidad, crear bien los disenos para producir diversas mochilas de varios colores, profundizar la investigacion por la estandarizacion de productos segun las caracteristicas fisicas por edades, operar bien la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas y cuidar bien los equipos.
					
					Dijo que se proponia construir en todas las provincias modernas fabricas de maletines y agrego que la Ciudad de Pyongyang tomo la delantera en la materializacion de las politicas del Partido. 
					
					Evaluo de loable el modo de trabajo del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang que al captar correctamente el problema al que concede importancia el Partido, llama a las masas a la movilizacion general para materializar la idea y las politicas del Partido.
					
					Senalando que es muy elevado el afan de trabajar de los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica que iniciaron la produccion del Ano Nuevo, expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos cumpliran con su deber al producir con esmero los maletines pensando que estos seran usados por sus hijos, y se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, An Jong Su, y los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won y Rim Jun Gil.

articles.title: Mitin de capitalinos para materializar tareas presentadas en el mensaje de Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Mitin de capitalinos para materializar tareas presentadas en el mensaje de Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin multitudinario de los capitalinos para materializar las tareas presentadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo. 
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del Partido y el Estado, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, las instituciones del partido y del Poder, fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas y los trabajadores de distintos estratos de la capital. 
					
					El miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim Su Gil, dijo en su informe que el mensaje del Ano Nuevo de Kim Jong Un sirve de noble guia e invicta bandera en elevar mas la fuerza espiritual y el impetu revolucionario de todos los militares y civiles del pais y asi registrar en el ano 2017 los acontecimientos nacionales mas significativos y los meritos heroicos. 
					
					Recordo que el ano pasado fue el de jubilo revolucionario y de gran viraje en la historia del PTC y la patria, y agrego que la gran confianza y benevolencias del Maximo Dirigente fueron la fuente fundamental de las victorias sucesivas. 
					
					Insistio en que todos los funcionarios, militantes del Partido y trabajadores deben levantarse con dinamismo en la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo para conquistar las metas de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional sosteniendo en alto la consigna combativa "!Impulsemos el avance victorioso del socialismo por la gran fuerza motriz que es la capacidad de fortalecernos con nuestros propios medios!".
					
					Llamo a todos a hacer ingentes esfuerzos por hacer brillar el presente con grandes victorias, y alcanzar lo mas pronto posible las grandes metas de la construccion de potencia socialista, presentadas por el VII Congreso del PTC, considerando el mensaje del Ano Nuevo de Kim Jong Un como maxima de la vida y la lucha.
					
					En el mitin pronunciaron los discursos de juramento los representantes de la clase obrera, los trabajadores agricolas, la juventud y los intelectuales. 
					
					Los oradores expresaron las decisiones de materializar a riesgo de la vida las tareas programaticas presentadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo para realizar los ideales y suenos del pueblo.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo una manifestacion multitudinaria. 
					
					Los participantes marcharon por la plaza al compas de la musica de instrumentos de viento sosteniendo en sus manos las pancartas y consignas como "!Anticipemos el futuro de Corea de Kim Jong Un, siempre prospera!", "Poderio de autofortalecimiento",  y "Poderio de ciencias y tecnicas".

articles.title: ACNC evalua de justo el incremento del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC evalua de justo el incremento del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de RPDC
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- En estos tiempos, varios paises estan empenados por incrementar sus fuerzas nucleares estrategicas para hacer frente a la amenaza nuclear de Estados Unidos.
					El 22 de diciembre del ano pasado, el presidente ruso Putin insistio en que su pais debe redoblar la potencialidad de las fuerzas nucleares estrategicas y disponer de la capacidad de ataque de misiles con que se pueda romper cualquier sistema antimisiles existente o del futuro y llevar asi al fracaso la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					En su comentario fechado 23 de diciembre, el periodico chino Huan Qiu Shibao subrayo que China ya se hizo el primer rival estrategico de EE.UU. y la mayoria de la presion de este recae a cada paso sobre aquella.
					
					Continuo en que tal circunstancia sera cambiada cuando la capacidad de China de amenazar con armas nucleares a EE.UU. sea tan suficiente para obligarle a renunciar su actitud. Advirtio que si el portaaviones norteamericano se convierta en una base de ataque contra China, hay que hacerle sufrir el destino de hundimiento.
					
					Las insistencias de dos potencias nucleares insinuan que los paises consideran el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares como el asunto vital para asegurar el desarrollo independiente del pais y la paz desde la recrudescente amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU.
					
					Hoy dia, debido al aumento y modernizacion imprudentes de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de EE.UU., se agrandan cada dia mas la inestabilidad mundial y el peligro de imprevisible guerra nuclear, y al mismo tiempo, los paises poseedores de armas nucleares mejoran cuantitativa y cualitativamente las fuerzas armadas nucleares estrategicas.
					
					Ahora el imperio americano presta mucha atencion a elevar el papel de los componentes de las fuerzas armadas nucleares en la actual estrategia militar de la OTAN. Ya se emplazaron en Turquia, Belgica, Alemania, Holanda e Italia casi 200 bombas aereas nucleares estadounidenses y 310 aviones de transporte se mantienen en estado de alerta.
					
					Rusia esta renovando el sistema de fuerzas nucleares estrategicas de 3 tipos, lo cual deviene una demostracion de su capacidad estrategica para mantener la posicion de potencia y contrarrestar a la OTAN liderada por EE.UU.
					
					Segun el balance de los trabajos de las ramas de las fuerzas armadas de 2016, efectuado en Moscu, llegan a 99% los dispositivos de lanzamiento de las unidades de misiles de Rusia que estan en estado de preguerra y el 96% de ellos, estan siempre listos para lanzarse de inmediato.
					
					Por el emplazamiento de 41 misiles balisticos de nuevo tipo, el nivel de armamentos modernos de los 3 tipos de fuerzas nucleares llego a 60%.
					
					Dicen que en el ano 2017, tres unidades equipadas con armas modernas se adicionaran a las fuerzas armadas de misiles nucleares de Rusia y las fuerzas aereas recibiran 5 bombarderos estrategicos modernizados.
					
					China tambien se esfuerza por el desarrollo de novisimo misil nuclear estrategico y afirmo su posicion de no dar ni un paso atras en el problema de mejorar su capacidad de amenaza nuclear. 
					
					Asi, hasta los paises que cuentan con extenso territorio, mucha poblacion y gran poderio economico dan prioridad al fortalecimiento de las propias fuerzas armadas nucleares para asegurar el desarrollo y la seguridad del Estado.
					
					Entonces, es muy natural el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que sufre directa y constantemente la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					La amenaza nuclear del imperio contra el pais socialista es incomparable con la que reciben otras potencias circunvecinas.
					
					A lo largo de mas de medio siglo, EE.UU. amenazo y chantajeo con armas nucleares a la RPDC y ahora exacerba extremadamente la presion politica y militar y las sanciones.
					
					Para hacer frente a ello, la RPDC realizo con exito la primera prueba de bomba H, el lanzamiento de ensayo de distintos medios de ataque, la prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear y la preparacion en ultima fase de lanzamiento de ensayo del cohete balistico intercontinental. Tales exitos alcanzados en la rama de fuerzas armadas nucleares estrategicas comprueban claramente que la RPDC dispone de poderosos medios de golpe nuclear estrategico para enfrentar a cualquier tipo de guerra impuesta por EE.UU.
					
					Es muy justo el que la RPDC haya poseido el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo frente a las imprudentes maniobras hostiles y la abierta amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Construir las fuerzas armadas nucleares estrategicas capaces de defender la seguridad estatal y mantener el equilibrio de las fuerzas, sera en el futuro tambien el interes principal de los paises.

articles.title: Hay que eliminar el choque militar y peligro de guerra Norte-Sur, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Hay que eliminar el choque militar y peligro de guerra Norte-Sur, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual del dia 5, el diario Rodong Sinmun subraya que a fin de salvar a los coreanos de la crisis de guerra y abrir la nueva brecha en el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion de la patria, es necesario tomar las medidas activas para eliminar el agudo choque militar y la peligrosidad de guerra entre ambas partes coreanas.
					El periodico reitera que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tiene la invariable posicion y voluntad de salvaguardar la seguridad de la nacion y la paz del pais sin pelear entre los connacionales y senala que la RPDC se esforzara en el futuro tambien como lo hizo en el pasado por defender la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la seguridad de la nacion.
					
					Debido a la agresiva estrategia de Estados Unidos de dominar a Asia y sus imprudentes tentativas de provocacion de guerra, hoy la Peninsula Coreana se convirtio en la region mas candente del mundo y origen de guerra nuclear, puntualiza el diario y continua:
					
					Gracias al poderoso disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC, en la Peninsula Coreana no estalla la guerra nuclear pese a la situacion cada dia mas aguda creada por el chantaje y la amenaza nucleares anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Pero, las autoridades titeres surcoreanas repiten como papagayo el rumor de "amenaza nuclear del Norte", inventado por su amo gringo, y se enfrascan en contubernio con el en las maniobras de provocacion de guerra anti-RPDC.
					
					El aumento armamentista y los alborotos de ejercicios de guerra que amenazan a su contraparte sirven del importante motivo que exacerba al maximo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana e impide el mejoramiento de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Si se ponen fin a tales tentativas malsanas en el Sur de Corea, se eliminaran la fuente del choque armado y el peligro de la guerra y se abrira una brecha importante en el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas.
